title: 382: CHATTY BROS: Mark Walberg & The Bros!
itunes:title: 382: CHATTY BROS: Mark Walberg & The Bros!
description:
The Bros are joined by #broadsquad favorite, Mark Walberg (Temptation Island)! They dive into Temptation Island, intentions for going on the show, they have an open conversation about toxic masculinity, therapy, Gen Z terminology, and much more! Oh, and you have to check out “Temptation Island”! 

 

MARK WALBERG:

Follow Mark on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/markwalberg/

Cameo: https://www.cameo.com/marklwalberg

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***STORYWORTH: Get $10 on your first purchase when you go to STORYWORTH.COM/CHATTY

***VEGAMOUR: Go to VEGAMOUR.COM/CHATTY and use code CHATTY to save 20% on your first order!

***THRIVE MARKET: Get 40% off your first order AND a free gift worth over $50 at THRIVEMARKET.COM/CHATTY

***FACTOR: Head to GO.FACTOR75.COM/CHATTY120 and use code CHATTY120 to get $120 off!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
